index.title: Maria & Ivan
index.welcomeText: We can't wait to celebrate with you!
index.detailsText: We'd love for you to join us as we tie the knot and start our life together! Please RSVP at the bottom of the page with the code you received. Consider it your official pass to the love, laughter, and dancing that awaits you.
index.ceremonyText: The ceremony will take place by the shore outside Sophienlyst Slot at 15:00. Afterward, sparkling wine and light snacks will be served. Please note that the start time may shift if the weather requires it.
index.receptionText: We sit down at 18:00 for a three-course dinner with wine. After 10 years in Denmark, we have integrated enough to insist on punctuality and an early dinner, so latecomers may remain hungry. From 20:00 until 02:00 we will keep the dance floor going. Our bar table will have assorted drinks available throughout the evening, and around midnight late-night food will be served for anyone who needs a recharge. There will be dedicated time for speeches, so if you want to say a few words, write a note in your RSVP.
index.infoTwoText: A limited number of guest rooms are available at the venue. If you'd like to stay overnight, we encourage you to RSVP as soon as possible. Priority will be given to our traveling guests. The venue will be open from June 25-28, and if rooms fill up, we'll be happy to assist you in finding nearby accommodations.
index.infoThreeText: Dark and elegant is the vibe. Gentlemen, think dark suits with a crisp shirt and tie or bow tie. Ladies, an elegant dress, ideally in darker tones. Save the bright and flashy colors for another party; this look is about timeless evening glamour.
index.rsvpCtaText: Use your invitation code to access the RSVP form.
